articles.title: Stocks Slip Ahead of GDP Data. S&P 500 Sits Just Below Record High.
articles.mainIdea: Stocks Slip Ahead of GDP Data. S&P 500 Sits Just Below Record High.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Stocks Slip Ahead of GDP Data. S&P 500 Sits Just Below Record High.. Stocks looked set to edge lower on Tuesday, with much of Wall Street on vacation and only a couple of economic data releases due between now and the holiday season. S&P 500 futures fell 0.1%, and contracts tied to the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 were also 0.1% lower. “The stock market is finally starting to eke out some gains for December after a choppy few weeks,” Granite Bay Wealth Management chief investment officer Paul Stanley said. Related tickers mentioned: E=F, N=F, Y=F, ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.

articles.title: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Change to the S&P/TSX Canadian Dividend Aristocrats Index

articles.summary: CNW Group: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Change to the S&P/TSX Canadian Dividend Aristocrats Index. S&P Dow Jones Indices announces the following index change to the S&P/TSX Canadian Dividend Aristocrats Index as a result of the monthly dividend review. Change will be effective prior to the open of trading on Friday, January 2, 2026. Related tickers mentioned: AP.UN, ^GSPTSE.
